targets.query:
from(bucket: "heating")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._name == "17_pufferladung")
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Pufferladung")
|> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])
|> yield()

from(bucket: "heating")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._name == "25_puffer-unten")
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Puffer unten")
|> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])
|> yield()

from(bucket: "heating")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._name == "24_puffer-oben")
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Puffer oben")
|> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])
|> yield()

mappings.text: F06: Brennkammer überfüllt oder kein Brennstoff

targets.query:
from(bucket: "heating")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._name == "20_betriebscode")
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Betriebscode")
|> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])
|> yield()

from(bucket: "heating")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._name == "79_programm")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value == "AUS" then 0 else if r._value == "NORMAL" then 1 else -1 }))
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Betrieb")
|> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])
|> yield()

from(bucket: "heating")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._name == "77_kesselfreigabe")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value == true then 1 else 0 }))
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Kesselfreigabe")
|> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])
|> yield()

from(bucket: "heating")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._name == "108_asche-leeren-in")
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Asche leeren in")
|> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])

|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)

|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Betriebszeit")
|> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])
|> yield()

from(bucket: "heating")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._name == "23_aussentemperatur")
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Aussentemperatur")
|> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "heating")

|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

|> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "heating")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._name == "38_pumpe-hk-1")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value == true then 1 else 0 }))
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Pumpe HK 1")
|> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])
|> yield()

from(bucket: "heating")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._name == "27_warmwasser-0")
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Warmwasser 0")
|> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "heating")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._name == "28_p-warmwasser-0")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value == true then 1 else 0 }))
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Pumpe Warmwasser 0")
|> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])

|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._name == "3_kesseltemperatur")
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Kesseltemperatur")
|> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])
|> yield()

from(bucket: "heating")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._name == "26_pumpe-hp0")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value == true then 1 else 0 }))
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Pumpe HP0")
|> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])
|> yield()

from(bucket: "heating")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._name == "78_betrieb")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value == "0" then 0 else if r._value == "AUS" then 0 else if r._value == "START" then 1 else if r._value == "ZÜNDUNG" then 2 else if r._value == "REGELUNG" then 4 else if r._value == "HAND" then 5 else if r._value == "NACHLAUF" then 3 else -1 }))
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Betrieb")
|> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])
|> yield()

|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
|> set(key: "_field", value: "CO2 Gehalt")
|> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])
|> yield()

from(bucket: "heating")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Leistung")
|> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])

|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Brennstoffzähler")
|> yield()
